message.content:
cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with question answering using multi-modal context, which involves natural language processing (NLP) and computer vision (CV) techniques. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which deals with NLP. The paper also involves CV techniques for processing visual information, which makes cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) another likely sub-category. The paper proposes a new framework for question answering, which involves machine learning techniques, making cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) a likely sub-category as well. The paper also involves attention mechanisms, which are a common technique in deep learning, making cs.LG (Machine Learning) another likely sub-category. Finally, the paper involves information retrieval techniques for retrieving context, making cs.IR (Information Retrieval) a possible sub-category.
